request.system_prompt: You are an expert photographer and image generation assistant. Help the user refine and improve images iteratively through conversation.

request.message: Create a professional headshot of a business executive

text: I've created a professional headshot of a business executive with clean lighting and professional composition.

request.message: Make the lighting softer and add more warmth to create a more approachable feeling

text: I've softened the lighting and added warmth to the portrait, creating a more approachable and friendly appearance while maintaining professionalism.

request.message: Change the background to a modern office setting with blurred city views

text: I've updated the background to show a modern office environment with beautiful blurred city views through large windows, adding context while keeping focus on the subject.

request.message: Perfect! Now make the person appear more confident and authoritative while keeping the warm, approachable feeling

text: I've adjusted the posture and expression to convey confidence and authority while maintaining the warm, approachable lighting and overall feeling. The result balances professionalism with accessibility.

request.message: I want to create a fantasy landscape with a magical forest. Start with something mystical and ethereal.

text: I've created a mystical forest scene with glowing elements, ethereal mist, and magical atmosphere. The composition has an otherworldly quality with soft, enchanting lighting.

request.message: Add a crystal-clear stream flowing through the forest with some glowing stones along the banks

text: I've added a beautiful crystal-clear stream that winds through the forest, with luminescent stones scattered along its banks that cast a soft, magical glow on the surrounding area.

request.message: Now add a small wooden bridge crossing the stream, and maybe some fireflies dancing in the air

text: I've added a charming wooden bridge that arches over the stream, and filled the air with dancing fireflies that create points of warm light throughout the magical forest scene.

request.message: Create a portrait in a photorealistic style

text: I've created a photorealistic portrait with natural lighting, sharp detail, and realistic skin texture and coloring.

request.message: Now transform it to have a painted, oil painting quality while keeping the same composition

text: I've transformed the portrait to have the rich, textured quality of an oil painting with visible brushstrokes and artistic color blending while maintaining the same composition and pose.

request.message: Make it more impressionistic, like Monet's style with softer edges and more atmospheric effects

text: I've evolved the style to be more impressionistic with softer edges, atmospheric light effects, and the characteristic brushwork reminiscent of Monet's technique.

request.message: Design a modern smartphone with a sleek appearance

text: I've designed a modern smartphone with clean lines, minimal bezels, and a sleek metallic finish that embodies contemporary design principles.

request.message: Add a unique camera module design that stands out but still looks elegant

text: I've added a distinctive camera module with a circular design and premium materials that creates visual interest while maintaining the overall elegant aesthetic.

request.message: Show it in different color variants - maybe a deep blue, rose gold, and matte black

text: I've created three color variants: a sophisticated deep blue, elegant rose gold, and premium matte black, each showing how the design adapts beautifully to different finishes.

progressive_refinement.description: Start with a basic concept and progressively add details, adjust elements, and refine the composition through multiple iterations.

style_exploration.description: Begin with one artistic style and evolve through different styles while maintaining the core composition.

composition_building.description: Build complex scenes by adding elements incrementally through conversation.

problem_solving.description: Use iterative feedback to solve specific visual challenges or achieve particular effects.
